extendedInfo.description: Landscape mode now supported!Instantly improve your writing! Brought to you by the Institute for Excellence in Writing (IEW), this free app includes charts and lists to help you write organized and stylish papers. Based on the nine structural models and the many stylistic techniques presented in the Teaching Writing: Structure & Style program (http://www.excellenceinwriting.com/TWSS-D), this application gives you tools to organize your writing, whether you are writing short stories, reports, essays, or book reports. Also includes lists chock-full of interesting word choices to improve your writing and vary your sentence structureâthe mark of a sophisticated writer. Perfect for the homeschooling student and the classroom teacher.

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: Perfect companion to the IEW curricula.
reviews.author: Deborah Morey

reviews.title: Arpan
reviews.comment: Hi

reviews.title: Very Good...
reviews.comment: This app tool is very helpful it would I\'m guessing be helpful with school essays. There is just one thing wrong with it. When you are given suggestions on words with ly and est and so on it does make sense and do really have no ise for this so I must uninstall it.
reviews.author: Skyler Flaig-Jacobs

reviews.title: GREAT APP :)
reviews.comment: Definitely install it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exceeds my expectation :)
reviews.comment: Simple and useful!
reviews.author: Emmarie Barrameda

reviews.comment: I\'ve never tried this yet but it looks good and rated well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: good!
reviews.author: Leap Alep

reviews.title: T
reviews.comment: V
reviews.author: purushotham jayaramaiah

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: I am intrigued by the innovation and potential that this application implies. But the actual content is very base. I could memorize all the information it contains within a single sitting. This application, in its current form, could possibly benefit many beginner writers, but experienced writers will be uninstalling after a few minutes, just like I did. However, I pan on revisiting this app in the distant future, to discover whether or not its developers have added enough content to make it useful to me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No landscape?
reviews.comment: Unfortunately I\'ll never know if it\'s fixed.  I\'m uninstalling.  I understand phone users tend to live in portrait...but who wants to write on a phone....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Couldn\'t be better
reviews.comment: This my friends is a good educational app. As an high school student I admire this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fabulous App for Students and Teachers
reviews.comment: This app is meant to be used with the Excellence in Writing curriculum. This is an excellent resource for students using this curriculum. The app is like having the Portable Wall accessible anywhere you have your smartphone or other device. I only wish it had MORE of everything! More -ly words, more quality adjectives, More lists, etc! Overall, this is a great beginner app and is a fun change from pulling out the Student Resource Book every time. Thanks, IEW, for a great FREE product!
reviews.author: Jill Whitmarsh

reviews.title: Stupendous App!
reviews.comment: Helpful! Useful! Thank you for creating this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: An excellent tool
reviews.comment: I only recently started looking through what this app has to offer, and already I\'ve found heaps of useful information. If you\'re looking for ways to improve your writing, don\'t hesitate to give IEW Writing Tools a try.
reviews.author: Jessica Hill

reviews.title: My kids are going to fight over this!
reviews.comment: Samsung galaxy note I just downloaded this on my new tablet and my new23 yr old said this was cheating:) of course, his next comment was that he\'s going to download  it on his tablet=) it\'s a hit!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handy Reminders!
reviews.comment: Convenient and practical app for teachers and students of IEW.  Nice to have in a pinch.  Easy to navigate with just the right amount of imPorTanT information.  Love it!  Thanks for another great resource!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handy!!
reviews.comment: I can see me referencing when we school at home and for sure when we are on the go! And now I can *show* some of what I rave about in regards to IEW :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is a huge help!
reviews.comment: I can see that this app is going to be wonderful to have right at hand as we write. We have needed our portable wall or binder at hand in the past but this will enable us to have these tools handy wherever we are writing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FAIL on tablets
reviews.comment: WHY should I want to write in PORTRAIT mode only on my Transformer Prime? The software forces this meaning I cannot use the keyboard.  Past this I do not care, so it\'s now in the bin.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: For all IEW students and teachers, this is an exemplary app for an even greater writing curriculum.
reviews.author: Emma Sitton
